items.sentence: This is one of the best restaurants in town.
This is one of the best schools in the city.
This is the bar where I drank my first beer.
Tom could see Mary was getting very nervous.
Tom is going to stay for another three days.
Tom is really interested in Greek mythology.
Tom just wants a muffin and a cup of coffee.
Tom often eats scrambled eggs for breakfast.
Tom doesn\'t look anything like his brother.
Tom doesn\'t need to worry about me anymore.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to sing at his party.
Tom doesn\'t want to audition for that part.
Tom doesn\'t want to go to the lake with us.
Tom has no idea how to operate this machine.
Tom has no intention of apologizing to Mary.
Tom has paid back all the money he borrowed.
Tom has promised to go to Australia with me.
Tom has suggested a solution to the problem.
Tom makes lots of promises he doesn\'t keep.
Can I count on your help tomorrow afternoon?
